item.title: GitHub + Gollum vs BitBucket Wiki
item.description: both Wikis are backed by Git repo both allow local edit Gollum See https://github.com/github/gollum#readme Installation: http://alblue.bandlem.com/2011/05/git-tip-of-week-gollum.html sudo gem install gollum Running 1 2 3 git init TestWiki gollum --page-file-dir wiki TestWiki openurl http://localhost:4567 Parsers - separate install 1 2 gem install rdiscount gem install wikicloth Get Wiki for repo 1 2 3 4 5 6 git clone URL URL: - git@github.
